alert.note: Alert for San Luis Obispo County Mountains; Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains; Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range; Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 20 at 12:00PM PST until December 21 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Southeast to south winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph are expected. Isolated gusts to 60 mph are possible on favored mountain peaks. * WHERE...San Luis Obispo County Mountains, Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range, Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range and Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains. * WHEN...Until 7 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles. Travel may be affected on area roadways by gusty cross winds, including Highways 154 and 166. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is a chance that this advisory may be extended later into Thursday.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: San Luis Obispo County Mountains; Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains; Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range; Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range
